If you are having trouble with activating your Blackphone and Silent Circle accounts, please contact customer support at support@blackphone.ch This license code appears to have been activated already. If you are resetting your phone, simply log into your Silent Circle account normally. If you are having trouble activating your Blackphone and Silent Circle accounts, please contact customer support at support@blackphone.ch

Cannot open key store. The password or PIN you entered is incorrect, please try again. Enter Password Enter old password Enter new password Enter password (verify) Password change failed. Using existing password. Old password is wrong. Locking key store. Change password Missing password. Information Show password Passwords do not match. Please check.
Tap on screen to toggle video control buttons. \n\nTouch small preview window to move it.
Start Silent Phone on boot Start Silent Phone during the device\'s startup procedure.
Enable firewall traversal If Silent Phone detects a restrictive firewall, try extra hard to complete your call.
Force firewall traversal Use a more reliable but lower-quality method of connecting the call audio, which may be needed on particularly bad networks.
Ask to secure other calls Silent Phone will ask whether you would like to secure calls placed from outside of Silent Phone.
Dropout tone Play low tone if no media packets are arriving. If heard often, you or your partner may want to change networks.
Echo canceler Automatic control of echo canceler. If not selected the echo canceler is always active
Show all errors Minor software errors that don\'t affect your experience are hidden by default.
Dial assist To simplify dialing, turn on Dial Assist and select a country. The number will automatically be formatted with your country code. Otherwise, dial \'+\' and the country code. To call other Silent Circle subscribers, simply dial their Silent Circle subscriber name. Select your country No dial assist Simple dial assist
Dial assist disabled. Adds \'+\' to form an international phone number. Adds \'+\' or \'+1\' or replaces a leading \'011\' with a \'+\' sign. Replaces a leading \'%1$s\' with country code %2$s and a leading \'%3$s\' with the \'+\' sign. Adds \'%2$s\' to dialed digits and replaces a leading \'%3$s\' with the \'+\' sign.
Enter a new password to enhance key store protection.\nYou need to enter this password every time you start Silent Phone. You can reset to default protection at any time.
Change your own key store password. The client resets key store protection to default after you entered your password. Enter your key store password.
Enter a new PIN to enhance key store protection.\nYou need to enter this PIN every time you start Silent Phone. You can reset to default protection at any time.
Change your own key store PIN. The client resets key store protection to default after you entered your PIN. Enter your key store PIN.

The list may show a device more than once if the app was removed and installed again. To enhance security a new installation creates a new security setup. \nClick on the remove button to delete an old device.
The list may show a device more than once if the app was removed and installed again on the partner\'s device.
Unknown Resend requested Composing Composed Sent Sent to server Delivered Received Read Burned Sync Unused Failed
No error Unknown error code Generic error code, unspecified error Unsupported protocol version Buffer too small to store some data Could not decrypt a received message Found no own identity for registration Missing a required JSON field No registered messaging devices found for the user Offered pre-key not found - unknown pre-key id No session for this user found Session not initialized Message too old to decrypt Incoming data corrupt Axolotl conversation exists while trying to setup new one HMAC check of encrypted message failed Incorrect padding of decrypted message Incorrect padding of decrypted supplementary data Not a real error, just to report that no staged keys available Mismatch of receiver\'s long term identity Mismatch of sender\'s long term identity Expected length of data does not match received length Expected device id does not match actual device id
Curve not supported Private and public key use different curves
Their identity key and our identity key use different curve types
The IV or other data length did not match the cipher\'s block size Key size not supported for this cipher

Sorry, this device doesn\'t appear to support SMS, so we can\'t send out an invitation. Sorry, you need to setup an email account before we can send out invitations by email. Sorry, the contact appears to have no phone or email, so we can\'t send out an invitation.
With a basic account, you get unlimited secure messaging and free incoming calls. \nVisit the Silent Circle website and upgrade your account to make outgoing calls.
